revised_title: Preserving and Processing Rapeseed for Vinegar Production
tldr: The author discusses the process of preserving and processing rapeseed for vinegar production. They explain the importance of keeping the rapeseed submerged in wine or vinegar to prevent spoilage and describe how to clean and extract grease from the rapeseed. The author also expresses interest in conducting experiments on the properties of the rapeseed grease.
